items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly in one-to-one and group chats.
acceptance_criteria: Messages appear in the chat window within 1 second of being sent
Messages are delivered in correct chronological order
Users can see when the other party is typing
dependencies: WebSocket or similar real-time communication service
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive high-quality video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start and end video calls from the chat interface
Video and audio quality remains stable with minimal lag under normal network conditions
Support for both one-to-one and group video calls
Display call duration and participant list during the call
non_functional: Support at least 5 participants in a group call
Adaptive bitrate streaming for varying network conditions

notes: Assumed that the application will be web-based with potential mobile support. Security, encryption, and cross-platform compatibility are implied but not explicitly stated by the user.
